body:
XintingGFX
Hi guys, XintingGFX here.
I'll present what i do (graphics)

I do banner or profile for what you want (like youtube)
Actually i just do 1 banner and profile for a friend (Thecalined)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=05Yjdz86WTM is the video of the banner if you want to see.

I'll do a list of who want a GFX for the order (will have the youtube channel if you have one) :
     1.No body

I'M NOW FREE FOR WAIT 1k SUBSCRIBERS

Contact me on my skype 'zirinci' with a comment on this topic with your name for know who you are
;)
Sorry for my bad english (i'm french)
Bye
   | | |  GIVEAWAY END IN 6 DAYS !
 \/\/\/

title: [FREE] Avicus's GFX

replies.body:
Ok, well i'll do a giveaway with a profile, a banner AND A ONE MONTH OF MINIATURES for free without my logo on.
For enter on the giveaway you have to :
  • Subscribe to my channel  : https://www.youtube.com/user/ZirinciGaming
  • Comment to this post with a random message like : "Thanks for do the giveaway i love cookies, yeaaaah"
All the 10 participation i will add a new profile and banner (so one winner added to the contest (without the 1 month of miniatures)

The winner will be vote in 1 week
Share, and enjoy
